description: Do you have any questions or suggestions?
Contact us using the form below or through the social media channels listed here.
form_description: I appreciate your feedback and questions.
Please fill out the form below to get in touch with me.

captcha.title: reCAPTCHA!
captcha.content: Please verify that you are human by completing the reCAPTCHA!

success.title: Message Sent
success.content: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.

error.title: Error
error.content: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again later.
